gold.user: As a team manager, I want to retrieve a list of all teams within my enterprise to manage their permissions and activities effectively.
gold.ideal: The response should include an array of team objects, each containing details such as team name, ID, and description.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to create a new team in my enterprise to facilitate collaboration among developers working on a specific project.
gold.ideal: The response should return the newly created team object with its ID, name, and other relevant details.

gold.user: As a team lead, I want to fetch the details of my specific team to review its members and their roles.
gold.ideal: The response should provide detailed information about the team, including its members, permissions, and description.

gold.user: As a team manager, I want to update the description of my team to reflect our current focus and objectives.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the update and return the updated team object with the new description.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to delete a team that is no longer active to keep our enterprise organized and free of clutter.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the team and return a success message.
